item.title: C# Scripting
item.description: Intro I came across C# scripting a few months ago as my team was trying to decide on a standard for how we wanted to share little scripts we had written to do small tasks. Traditionally I’d use a tool like LinqPad to accomplish this, but since we didn’t want to buy a Enterprise License we decided to try out C# Scripts. I’ve been surprised by how nice it is to have a small scratch pad to test out new ideas or to rapidly prototype a solution.
